nodes.text: Plo's Bros was the name given to a Republic LAAT/i gunship used by the 104th Battalion during the Clone Wars.

Plo's Bros was first deployed at Felucia during the Clone Wars. There, it was one of the many gunships used to evacuate Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker, as well as Jedi Commander Ahsoka Tano and their clone troopers when they were surrounded by Separatist forces. Plo's Bros was then used by General Plo Koon, Commanders Tano, Wolffe, and several members of the Wolfpack to rescue Generals Mace Windu and Skywalker from the Endurance on Vanqor. It was also used to rescue Kenobi and Skywalker's team from Lola Sayu.
Clone Commander Wolffe and several members of the Wolfpack then used the gunship to drop off supplies on Aleen.
